abstract: Angelo Palombo (born 25 September 1981) is an Italian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Sampdoria. Born in Ferentino, he has played in Serie A for Fiorentina, Sampdoria and Internazionale. Palombo won 21 caps for Italy at full international level.
